segments.text: This kitchen scene is honestly infuriating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so completely absorbed in her dish that she misses everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing violently, soaking the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm angry that she's not paying any attention to such a basic household disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so oblivious to their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is precariously balanced on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see him reaching into the cookie jar, totally risking a bad fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I am fearful he's going to tumble backward at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing by, complicit in the whole risky endeavor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't anyone else see this unfolding catastrophe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this situation is just begging for an accident to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
